title: Old paintings, photographs
review: Can be visited if interested in old paintings, photographs & old items of Gobind Vallabh Pant. Not maintained properly

title: Worth visiting
review: Very close to temple. Worth visiting here . You can see very very old pre historic idols.

title: Rich
review: There are lot of things here to see. Most of them are related to this local area and culture that is good.

title: Interesting place
review: GV Pant institute and museum are both dedicated to an interesting man that had a vision to help the villagers. The Pant Institute is busy with research for all types of innovations for mountain people. An inspiring place to see.

title: review of museum
review: its a good museum , its a well mentioned & cleaned , without taking any fees to see museum , they mentioned very cleaned . Its nice collection of various items related to villager . worth to see it , its near bus stand at Almora.

title: a waste of time
review: this temple is located on the mall road in Almora . entry is free .

title: Govind Vallabh Pant Public Museum Almora.
review: Govind Vallabh Pant Public Museum is located near Bank of India . It is the only museum in Almora and surely deserves a visit. The museum has a good collection of o historical Items.It is also very good for the students to know abut the ancient history .

title: Very big museum on Mountain
review: I have seen very rare museum on Mountain. This is really very big museum. There are lots of information lying in this place. This is really peaceful place.

title: nice place to see historical antiques
review: It is one of the popular tourist destinations in Almora city. It was built to dedicate Pandit Govind Ballabh Pant, a freedom fighter.The museum possess a varied and good collection of ancient antiques which date back to the Katyuri and Chand dynasties that ruled Uttarakhand for years.The museum also houses a good collection of an ancient form of Kumauni paintings which are called Aspen in the museum. These paintings are a reliable and good source of information for research on Uttarakhand’s culture and history.

title: The Only Museum In Almora Worth Visiting
review: Govind Vallabh Pant Public Museum is located near Almora bus stand. It is the only museum in Almora and surely deserves a visit. The museum has a rich collection of fascinating items relating to history, archeology and ones having cultural significance. One such item being ‘Apen’, folk style of painting found in this region that can be seen in this museum. It should be in the list of travelers visiting Almora

title: Really need maintenance
review: This place is good but not well maintained. this place really need more care and attention. This is really good.

title: Small but an Eye-Opener
review: I felt lucky to visit the said museum due to its association with the name of one of the great sons of Almora. It is situated on the busy Mall Road has a very good definitive collections of Kumaon in particular starting well from antiquity. The way of life aptly displayed, but was amazed to see and unique coinage collection which would even have made any well known museum proud to be its owner. Good photo display.
